com.cz2006.helloworld.managers

Class DatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cz2006.helloworld.managers.DatabaseManager

  • public class DatabaseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    DatabaseManager includes methods to implement basic SQLite database and table operations, such as open database, close database, insert data, update data, delete data and query data.
